statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_premiums WHERE age < 30;
SELECT name, occupation, premium_amount FROM insurance_premiums WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, name, policy_type FROM insurance_premiums WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_premiums WHERE occupation LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT name, age, premium_amount FROM insurance_premiums WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender, occupation, premium_amount FROM insurance_premiums WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM insurance_premiums WHERE occupation = 'Engineer' AND premium_amount > 5000 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, policy_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_premiums WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name ASC, premium_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM insurance_premiums WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, occupation, premium_amount FROM insurance_premiums WHERE occupation LIKE '%Manager%' AND policy_type = 'Health' ORDER BY premium_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, policy_type FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT customer_name, age, policy_type FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_name, premium_amount, payment_date FROM customers JOIN premiums ON customers.customer_id = premiums.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age >= 25;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, policy_type FROM customers WHERE policy_type IN ('Family', 'Health') ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.premium_amount, p.payment_date FROM customers c JOIN premiums p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(premium_id) AS num_premiums FROM customers LEFT JOIN premiums ON customers.customer_id = premiums.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING num_premiums > 2 ORDER BY num_premiums DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_name, age, address FROM CustomerData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM CustomerData WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT plan_name, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePlans WHERE coverage_amount >= 5000;
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM CustomerData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC, age ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePlans WHERE coverage_amount > 1000 ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC, plan_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC, amount DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM CustomerData JOIN PremiumPayments ON CustomerData.customer_id = PremiumPayments.customer_id WHERE CustomerData.age < 40 ORDER BY CustomerData.age ASC, PremiumPayments.payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, plan_name, payment_date, amount FROM CustomerData JOIN PremiumPayments ON CustomerData.customer_id = PremiumPayments.customer_id JOIN InsurancePlans ON PremiumPayments.plan_id = InsurancePlans.plan_id WHERE InsurancePlans.coverage_amount > 2000 ORDER BY InsurancePlans.coverage_amount DESC, CustomerData.age ASC, PremiumPayments.payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY first_name DESC, age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'FEMALE';
SELECT customer_id, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'HEALTH' AND policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_id, customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type='Life Insurance' AND premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY policy_start_date ASC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.policy_type, py.payment_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN policies p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id INNER JOIN payments py ON p.policy_id = py.policy_id WHERE py.payment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY c.last_name, p.policy_type;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM Customers ORDER BY gender ASC
SELECT customer_id, occupation FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customers WHERE occupation = 'Engineer'
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE policy_amount > 5000
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM Policies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_amount, p.start_date FROM Claims c JOIN Policies p ON c.policy_id = p.policy_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 5000
SELECT pr.customer_age_group, pr.base_rate FROM PremiumRates pr WHERE pr.gender = 'Female' AND pr.occupation = 'Engineer'
SELECT pc.customer_id, pc.policy_id, pc.premium_amount FROM PremiumCalculations pc JOIN Customers cu ON pc.customer_id = cu.customer_id WHERE cu.age < 40 ORDER BY pc.premium_amount DESC
